website_summaries.verdict: This attractive pair of white corner shelves is simple yet durable and well-made.
pros: We love the hidden wall mounting, which looks sleek without any visible brackets or hanging hardware
Made from a durable MDF and laminate combo
cons: Only fit in corners of exactly 90 degrees

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little shelves. Installation was super easy (4 screws that come with drywall anchors if needed) and a unique mounting concept that hides the screws completely. They're a little on the small side but good for small items that you want to display (or in my case, reduce clutter on my very small bathroom sink). didn't have a tape measure available, but you can compare the size to the typical sized toothbrushes in my photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A Minor Bead of Caulk
customer_reviews.text: Not all walls meeting in a corner are perfectly straight; therefore, a minor bead of caulk where the walls meet the top edges of the shelves will give you that 'finished' look you will want! A minor gap between wall surfaces and the outside edge of the shelves can be surrounded with sheetrock tape before applying the white silicon caulk. Be sure to gently sweep the caulk into place with a fingertip and then remove the tape by pulling it up-and-away from the freshly applied caulk. A clean professional installation will be the end result!
customer_reviews.author: J.Porter

customer_reviews.title: Have extra screws on hand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets because I needed 3 shelves. It took me about an hour to install all three, mainly because I had to switch drill bits for each hole/screw. The included screws strip kind of easily when using a power drill, so try to have a couple extra screws on hand. I didn’t use the anchors since I have plaster walls. These shelves are the perfect size for up to an 8”x10” framed photo and a couple small tchotchkes. Great for saving space in my small hallway!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Foshe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but use your own hardwear/screws
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are so cute! I am ordering another set for my other plants. The suggested method of installation is stupid though. They say you just need a manual screwdriver and they give you really crappy screws. My boyfriend used an electric screw driving and our own hard wear and installed them our own way. If we used the hardwear provided, the shelves would have been too unstable for what we needed them for which is why I am giving 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carra Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are beautiful and easy to install, but there are some things the manufacturer should correct: The instructions state a 3/32 drill is enough to set the anchors, but that is far too small - even a 1/8 is too small. A 1/4th is where the tip of the anchor will properly insert, and then you can lightly twist it in with a screwdriver manually to secure it. The plastic anchors are also prone to breaking, so either be very careful or get a pack of metal anchors as backups. Otherwise, this is a great mid-cost shelf that perfectly matches the floor molding of our house.
customer_reviews.author: Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time/energy/money
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you pay for with these. They’re inexpensive for a reason. The installation should be easy, but it’s not. The anchors it comes with broke when screwed into the wall because they’re so cheap. I had to use a few of my own anchors in the end. The other big con: the shelves aren’t flush with the wall. There are gaps- very visible. I would recommend spending the extra money for quality shelves- if I hadn’t already put them up I would get diff ones.
customer_reviews.author: KaitD8

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install, but it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line is I like the shelves. However, installation was a pain in the tookus! Should have been easy. I love the screw in wall anchors, I'm just not sure why they came with such long screws. My assumption was the end of the anchor is supposed to break off when inserting the screw, but instead the screw ended up breaking the entire anchor. I had to dig around the house for other anchors and screws. My advice would be to KO the long screws and use shorter ones. And like another reviewer said, a corner of one of the shelves , the paint was scratched off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Good product, very cheap plastic wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: Shelves look great when installed and level. Only issue we had was the very cheap plastic wall anchors would break during install. I believe we broke more then we used. Good thing we are loading more then a couple pounds on these shelves. If you choose to get these I would recommend getting better quality wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Shawntay C.

customer_reviews.title: Covered in black mold and broken.
customer_reviews.text: These showed up disgusting. They are literally covered in mold. Black mold. I am allergic to black mold and instantly had a reaction. Not only that, one of the corners is busted. Total junk that I had to throw away. They should have been embarrassed to package these and ship them.
customer_reviews.author: randomprincess

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought these over cheaper options. They are very well made, sturdy and look great up. My only critique is that I didn't like the anchors that came with the hardware so I used some others that I had previously purchased from home depot. Other than that they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Niyya

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Hardware Compatibility.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible & Unusable. The plastic threaded drywall inserts are threaded too small for the screws they provide. The screw threaded so hard into the insert that it broke the top off and spun a nice large hole into the wall. On top of that, aligning the shelf was a treat given it’s not exactly 90degrees. Will return. See pictures ...
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: DIRTY AND CHIPPED!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these once and they came in disgustingly dirty and moldy. I assumed it was just a bad batch and sent them back and got new ones. These ones came in and they were worse!! So disappointing. The corners are chipped and the shelves are disgusting! Mold and dirt all over. Don’t buy unless you want to have to paint them yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Aubri Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly in a corner in my living room. Might be better to sell in a set of 3 but the 2 look great nonetheless. The edges of the shelves that I received were scuffed so I had to touch up the paint but not anything so horrible that they couldn't be used. I also love that the shelf sits down onto the lip of the wall bracket so it looks great from the underneath view (doesn't show screws like some other shelf options I saw). Great addition for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: KHarris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOOK! Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our needs to add decor to the area behind the desk in our office. Needed something quick and easy to install, and didn’t have the time to purchase a whole bookshelf to assemble. Very sturdy and the assembly was super easy for my husband to install. I think you could even use those adhesive strips if your decor is lightweight enough. Great choice and would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Blair

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and look great. They come with a back piece that you attach to the wall and then the shelf sits on top. Came with directions but so easy to set up that they weren’t even needed. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maltese Love

customer_reviews.title: Cute shelf if you aren't a perfectionist
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shelves but there were a few issues. I ordered two sets - most arrived chipped and/or chipping and each set had a different size screw which makes no sense. They do look great though!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good shelves!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We actually put these up with command strips for products 16+ pounds. We tried this before drilling 8 holes into the wall. They have stayed well and are secure. They look nice in our dining room and we are happy!
customer_reviews.author: lls12a

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid these would look funny. But, they are exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: inspect item before use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of the shelves, 4 total. Opening the first box, not knowing it was four separate pieces, the part that attaches to the wall fell off the shelf, hit the floor and broke. I also noticed that the corner of the shelf was chipped. When I looked closely at all 4 shelves, all for of the shelves had the right corner chipped on them. Very disappointing. Shipping was quick as expected. Had difficulty installing, had to use our own drywall mounts.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Carelessly made, not a very good quality product. There are cracks along the seams and several chips and dents on both pieces. The only reason I didn’t give it one star is because the installation instructions are very straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Packaged dirty
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, although when it arrived the shelves were DIRTY. Nothing a paper towel couldn’t fix but still, when something is wrapped up in plastic you don’t expect it to be filthy and need to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, only two pieces. Installing it may be a bit tricky, but after the first one not a problem. I did have a problem with the anchors continuing to bore through the wall when I was attaching the screws. They were smaller than I had hoped, but still did the job. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Molly C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money- a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on picture but when you actually go to install they are a pain. My husband refuses to put the rest up and wants to just throw them away. They are a pain to get even to the wall, etc
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and are very sturdy. The wall anchors that come with it are terrible and the instructions mediocre. Use your own wall anchors. The shelves themselves are easy to assemble and easy to disassemble if you needed to move them.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & clean style
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size & clean style to go in nursery. Helped my husband install since t takes one person to hold while other marks drill spots and it’s design made it fairly easy. We had the baby monitor mounted nearby so we cut holes in the back to help hide the cord.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged and dirty, I have white paint so I think I’ll just try to fix it vs return since with kohl’s closed it’s more of a pain. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelves!
customer_reviews.text: We thought mom would put pics of us on these shelves! She put plants on them instead! Whatevs. The plants look good! We’re still super good looking pups! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Finnegan And Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Very neat shelf, especially for the price. The hidden mounting hardware is well thought out. Some combination of the corner and the shelf weren't exactly square, but I expected that. The shelf is flexible enough that it was able to flex just a bit so it's not noticeable. It is sturdy and seems like it could hold a decent amount of weight. Installation was easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love love so easy to install love the way they look I put them in my bathroom on both sides of my tub looks great looks like very expensive shelves good buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Miss C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and durable
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are durable and were easy to assemble. The are perfect for a little corner shelf and hold the weight as described. I put large snow gloves that are rather heavy on them and feel comfortable knowing these shelves will hold the weight easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and moldy
customer_reviews.text: These shelves have potential to be nice. Unfortunately, mine showed up damaged and covered in mold. I opened it thinking it was saw dust residue or something that happened during the manufacturing process. I was willing to clean them up a bit because I’m really in need of shelves. The corners are chipped and there are other spots where the material has chipped. They stink so bad of mold I’m leaving them outside until I have time to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Z

customer_reviews.title: Cute shelves
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with these shelves. They were easy to install and look nice. They’re not super large which was good for the space I wanted them but just be aware if you’re expecting to put something large on them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M

customer_reviews.title: A corners dream
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great! I used this for my bathroom but this will look good in any room. Absolutely love this and a good price too!
customer_reviews.author: janelle acain

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate and just order it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest shelf I’ve ever installed. Love the look and will work great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very good construction and quality shelves. Installing the bracket was time consuming as you had to install 4 screws. After punching a hole for the 4 anchors. But my husband did all of that, so for me, it was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lmidd

customer_reviews.title: great shelves-easy to install
customer_reviews.text: omg! these shelves are awesome. So so easy to install, installed one the day I rec'd my order and they look great! Will buy more soon. I sued mine for my oil diffuser in my bedroom near my bed, they look beautiful, great quality and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: SJ Gal

customer_reviews.title: Installing was easy to assemble & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these corner shelves. Very easy to install on the wall. I received all the screws and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I received the shelves, actually I thought I was buying one but it was two... I put it up and placed my Murano Glass Aquarium which weighs 4 lbs. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Dodger

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the quality of these shelves
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived exactly as advertised. I was very happy with the quality of these shelves. Also, they were extremely easy to install. I compared a few different brands before purchasing these and will be purchasing another set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Love how these shelves look in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: So in love with how these shelves give my bathroom such character and warmth makes it feel very homey and not bland anymore. I used a drill and anchors.. it very strong.
customer_reviews.author: shemmy shem

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get over how different and pretty this shelf has made my wall look! I love it! I decided on the white, very easy to install! I did it myself! The crown molding look on the front is just really nice! Don’t hesitate get this! Fast shipping and when I first took it out the box it looked super small the when I installed it, everything came together! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, really like being able to remove shelve easily (wall brackets stay in place). I cut one inch off the rear corner to allow for an electrical cord. That way I can use it for an electric toothbrush stand or a small electric ceramic heater without the clutter of their cords draping off the front of shelve.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price... cheap product. Serves its purpose I guess
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price I guess. Pretty crappy material. Seemed cheap. But the Price is cheap so it is what it is. It’s working fine to hold our baby monitor camera in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Tedder

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and easy to install. It's even a little forgiving if your walls aren't quite square, or you didn't install them perfectly. I use them for a phone charging station, right by an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order!!!
customer_reviews.text: The screws were way too long and didn’t fit the anchors at all. I was soo disappointed as I trusted the reviews. My husband spent hours trying to find screws that would work. Loved the shelves once he make shifted installation but so disappointed item wasn’t easy install and screws didn’t come close to working. Don’t order this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Teresi

customer_reviews.title: ... they do not look cheap at all they were easy to assemble and they are very sturdy I use ...
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are quality and they do not look cheap at all they were easy to assemble and they are very sturdy I use them in my living room and they look great
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Anchor screws are bad
customer_reviews.text: When screwing in the anchor screws which come with the shelves the heads of the screws break off. Be really careful about screwing this into drywall. I went to Home Depot and purchased some better screws as the ones that come with the shelves are cheap and break.
customer_reviews.author: E. David Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shelves! I purchased a set (2) for myself and then ended I buying another set for my husband. I plan on buying another set for the kitchen to display my cookbooks
customer_reviews.author: Hot Mess Express

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little shelves!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly easy to install, 10 minutes to install. Not for corners where molding may be present in the corner, going down the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Shelves are sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I placed these shelves above my corner desk and they provide a use of the upper wall space both practical and decorative. The wood block is attached to the wall and then the shelf mounts around the block so nothing shows. Perfect use of a corner space and big enough to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and really handy. I used it behind a corner mounted tv to put Apple TV etc on out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Joy

customer_reviews.title: Bad hardware, cute shelves
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are cute and nice for displaying small objects. 5x7 picture frame barely fits. The problem was the mounting hardware that came with it. The wall anchors were so flimsy 2 of them broke just trying to install them into pre-drilled holes. luckily we could get away with only 3 screws per shelf since they are so lightweight and cannot hold much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: creating space in a small bedroom. I did a lot of measuring and research before I chose these. it had to be the perfect measurement to fit which I knew these would buuuuut, I loved the easy directions and how easy it was to install. I ordered 2 pairs, totaling 4 shelves. only one had a verrrrrrry small imperfection that was fixed in seconds. it was berry good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: The bracket to the wall is L shaped with two screws on each side, so once you get one screw in just use a level to align it for the other side, very easy install. Then the shelf itself just sits down on the wall mount, so if you need to take the shelf down for any reason (painting, cleaning) it's simple and quick. I wish the shelf was a little bigger but it serves its purpose, enough so that I bought 2. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install, with limited tools and assembly needed. Will purchase more, most definitely.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the ease of installing the shelves, and also how they enhance the overall décor of a room by utilizing corner areas without looking cluttered and messy. I have two in the same corner approximately eight (8) inches apart, with just a few items on each. It looks perfect. I plan on ordering more, as even when used individually they add a little extra "something" to the room.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH   KIN

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with chipped paint on all corners. Worst, the drywall anchors are easily broken. They broke when I tried to install them following the instructions. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subpar paint
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy but... came chipped with a crappy sandy white finish. I could have spray painted it better myself. The shelf is sturdy and easy to put up but will have to be repainted. I ordered a replacement to see if they are any better.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Georgiades

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great corner shelf. I used them in my master bathroom to alleviate some of the clutter on the counter. Easy to install - took me about 30 minutes to get them up.
customer_reviews.author: Arayah R.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but looked cheaper than I had hoped, and I found that getting it to sit snugly enough on the brackets that it didn't wobble was more challenging than I would have liked. Ended up returning it and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could fit more!
customer_reviews.text: Guess what - the corners of this product are probably 90 degrees. But your walls aren’t! So be prepared for a bit of a fight. But they look SO GOOD once they are in!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Eh its OK
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, it would help if the people who built my walls actually made them square... overall product is as advertised. Looks nice if you have straight walls.
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. As shown like the picture. I use it to my small 1/2 bathroom. I also ordered toilet paper roll and install That under the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Christin cosuineau

customer_reviews.title: Good size and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are really sturdy and looking good. I am happy with size as it works great for my room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Z

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was fine...it was abit dirty/ dusty even though it was in a plastic wrapped and a shipping box. It had a couple chipped areas on it that I will have to touch up with some pair. It is sturdy enough and was not too hard to put together. The drywall as nchors was as bir cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect to trim a kitchen cabinet corner and for a small bedroom as a platform next to the bed for phone or glass of water. So easy to install even I could do it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jalila

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to install but it wasn't very durable. The piece you screw into the wall has split already on one of the shelves so I had to throw one away.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m a shelf person they double cabinet space in apartments which were built in the 1970’s with weird clearance these work perfect
customer_reviews.author: Midgetguru

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for what I needed for. Won’t go in the space I had plan. So I just passed on
customer_reviews.author: Joanie M Rice

customer_reviews.title: corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: Cute, sturdy, and not too hard to mount on the wall. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great shelving. Looks nice and design is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great shelving. Looks nice and design is excellent. Two Parts. One part (base in connected to wall and then shelve with molding look sits nicely over the base covering screws. Excellent design.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware insufficiencies
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to install as long as you use the proper hardware. The directions don't say to predrill your holes but if you don't the dry wall screws crack and you won't be able to screw them in or possibly out. Otherwise so far so good. It is easy to install but I gave 3 stars for that because of the quality of drywall screws. Use your own mounting hardware or predrill your holes a little bigger and you'll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelves
customer_reviews.text: Product is really nice. The anchors it came with kept breaking even after predrilling the holes, so went to homedepot to get better ones. Other than that took only minutes to install. Looks sharp!
customer_reviews.author: KEITH

customer_reviews.title: Wall anchors suck!
customer_reviews.text: Followed exact instructions. The size drill bit they recommend is way too small in order to screw in the drywall anchors. Two of them snapped and broke off in my wall! I gave up after getting only one shelf up since I now have extra holes in my wall with plastic sticking out!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Donghia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shelves for the price. Unfortunately they didn’t fit the corner I wanted to place them in because I’m a dumb dumb and didn’t measure before I bought so I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: These shelves were even nicer than I expected. They are decent size, easy to install, and look very sharp. The perfect solution in a tiny bathroom with no room for standard shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, for the price, and looked used and dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. They were dirty, look used, and mildewed. Ordered again, same thing. I just took the lost. Didn’t send them back the last time.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not flush against the wall.
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are very elegant and perfect for what I need them for. I’m only giving it three stars though cause they don’t sit flush against the wall. Installation wasn’t too difficult but it’s tricky making sure all the holes are lined up. The idea is great, but the product could use an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fread

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch !
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time . Light weight great for my vision . Only down side about this product corners came chipped. After further inspection there is little chips around all edges . A little disappointed but nothing a little touch up can’t handle ! It gave my livingroom a great classy look . Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf, nice added addition to my living room corner
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cute shelves!
customer_reviews.text: Cute shelves we added to the end of our kitchen cabinets! Almost look like they were meant to be there this whole time. I can put some cute decor or plates up there now! Made a nice addition to my open concept kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: jmorganw

customer_reviews.title: Dirty shelves
customer_reviews.text: These shelves arrived and are extremely dirty. Within the plastic packaging they were covered in dirt. I unwrapped them and their is fine brown dirt all over them, looks like they got caught in a dust bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Lajeskie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to add a little decoration to the nursery. Very easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Camp

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and much stronger than I expected. They look great
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Tomasini

customer_reviews.title: It's a shelf.  It goes in the corner.  It looks like wood.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was quick and easy. The product feels quite cheap and hollow, but once mounted on the wall, it looks perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: CatSkinner

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelving
customer_reviews.text: This solved a lot of of problems with needing shelving in a small space that a cabinet would have overwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice decorative shelves for light weight things. While they were to small for me to use, I will re order in brown for my bedroom for decorations and pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Carl L. Bost Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: A corner arrived damaged. The corner shelves don’t touch the walls. It might just be my walls, not quite sure. Way smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: When ours arrived one of the shelves’ corners was cracked and the paint chipped, the anchors they provide are extremely cheap and broke as we put them in the wall and the screws they provide were WAY bigger than the anchors. Not to mention the shelves were not a perfect 90 degree angle so they did not sit flush to the corner. We are in the process of returning now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Boland

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to instsll
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! I can’t speak for durability since I just got it, but super easy to install. I screwed the screws into the drywall myself with just a screwdriver. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Luna72

customer_reviews.title: Look great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These were super easy to install and I love the look of them! I would definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came Ruined
customer_reviews.text: This product came in completely ruined. The corners are all stripped of their paint and the cheap material it’s made out of is showing on each one in each corner. The wall piece used to mount the shelf also came broken in 2 pieces. I am not happy with this product and I will be sending it back. I wouldn’t want it hanging on my walls looking the way it came.
customer_reviews.author: lancetss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution in my newborns room
customer_reviews.text: We used this to hold her monitor and some other things too high for her reach.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice corner shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my newly remodeled bathroom and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye Catching!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely and easy to install!! I used one in my bedroom and the other in my master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: a'nita

customer_reviews.title: Size in much larger than the noted dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice looking shelf, well constructed, however from the point that goes into the corner to the end, is 11 inches not 7.69, so they do not fit, as I have a window at 8 inches. I am so bummed, they really look nice, and have a nice bracket for that floating shelf look.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Baisley

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. So many reviews on others talk about ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. So many reviews on others talk about the cheap quality. Not these! I love the easy assembly and the hidden screws. Took about 20 min to install. They are exactly what I wanted. So many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Scalogna

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a Gap
customer_reviews.text: Tried several walls. Shelf isn’t flush with the wall. If I force the bracket to be flush, the shelf doesn’t fit in the brackets. Confused????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to spruce up a room
customer_reviews.text: Came with a small break on a corner, just glued and painted. Installed easily and looks great in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t want to drill 4 holes? Buy double diesel tape as well.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. But I’m. It a fan of drilling 4 wholes into my wall. I’m purchasing double sided cushioned tape to stick these shelves up. Would be great if it came with them. Otherwise, Product came as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nicely priced, super fast shipping, and great packaging. Love these shelves and their quality is good. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pace

product_meta.title: SHELVING SOLUTION Corner Wall Shelf (White)
feature_bullets: White color to fit any décor, A pack of 2 Shelves
No visible connectors or hanging hardware, All hardware included
Dimensions: 16.3" x 8.1" x 1.75",Holds up to 7.7 lbs(3.5kg)

Notice: The shelf comes with brackets, and only fit for Right Angle corner of 90 degrees. Please understand that wood products are easily damaged during transportation. If any quality problems, please contact us first. We will do our best to give you a satisfied solution.
